title: Ontology-Based Learning Analytics and Educational Data Mining Design

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Aims to develop a data-driven decision-making model applicable across diverse educational settings

learning_goals: Learners can analyze educational data patterns using an ontology-based decision tree model
Learners can design prediction rules for educational domains by applying SWRL (Semantic Web Rule Language)

Within six months, learners design a learning analytics model applicable to ≥3 public education courses, demonstrate ≥80% model accuracy, and validate reusability through verification by three field experts.
Through project-based assessment, learners can achieve over 90% prediction accuracy using real educational datasets
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
